completionObjective.title: Deploy Production-Ready Web Application
completionObjective.description: Launch a fully functional, tested, and production-ready web application with user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard
successCriteria: All core features implemented and tested
User acceptance testing completed with >90% satisfaction
Security audit passed with no critical vulnerabilities
Performance benchmarks met (<2s load time, <200ms API response)

definitionCriteria.howDefined: Based on business requirements and user stories gathered during discovery phase
definitionCriteria.whenChanged: Only with explicit user approval after reviewing impact on timeline and resources
definitionCriteria.changeProcess: 1. Propose change with rationale, 2. Review with stakeholders, 3. Update timeline/resources, 4. Document decision
definitionCriteria.versionControl: All changes tracked in projectlogic.jsonl with timestamp and reasoning

milestones.title: Foundation Setup
milestones.description: Core project structure, development environment, and basic functionality
deliverables: Project structure established with React TypeScript
Basic routing implemented with React Router
Database schema defined and migrations created
CI/CD pipeline configured with GitHub Actions

milestones.title: Core Features Development
milestones.description: Implement primary application features including user management and payment processing
deliverables: User authentication system with JWT tokens
User profile management with avatar upload
API endpoints for all core features

milestones.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
milestones.description: Comprehensive testing, security audit, and performance optimization
deliverables: Unit tests for all modules (>90% coverage)
E2E tests for critical user flows

milestones.title: TODO Review & Resolution
milestones.description: Review and resolve all TODO items from Placeholders/todos.jsonl before project completion
deliverables: Complete review of all TODO items in Placeholders/todos.jsonl
Implementation plan created for TODO resolution
All TODO items resolved or explicitly documented as future work
Clean codebase with no placeholder implementations
notes: This milestone can be initiated at any time upon user request
Implementation plan will be created based on TODO complexity and priority
Task list will be generated to systematically address all TODO items
Work continues until todos.jsonl is empty (all items handled)

milestones.title: Documentation & Deployment
milestones.description: Complete documentation, production deployment, and monitoring setup
deliverables: Deployment scripts and infrastructure as code

riskFactors.mitigation: Implement adapter pattern for payment providers and maintain fallback options
Test all migrations in staging environment and maintain rollback scripts
Regular dependency updates and automated security scanning

changeLog.description: Added performance metrics to M-02 deliverables
changeLog.reason: Performance requirements clarified during stakeholder review
